Title: Requires labels on certain foods and beverages containing harmful ingredients
Summary: Requires harmful ingredient labels on certain foods and beverages containing harmful ingredients; requires the creation of rules and regulations regarding the content and placement of harmful ingredient labels.
LawCode: Add ยง214-p, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to requiring labels on certain foods and beverages containing harmful ingredients
